name: Shrink High Gaiden: Hanpane Island
description: Shrink 'High Gaiden (Japanese: 縮小学園外伝) is a spin-off of the original Shrink 'High video game. It follows along the original storyline, retaining the majority of the characters - but follows the story of Narue much more closely. Diary of Narue was published alongside this to further the story.
